resources.string: Since you\'re trying to resize and compress more than one image, It\'d be wise to make sure the selected images are at-least of the same size. The size below is extracted from the first image only and will be applied to all the selected images
A slower preset will provide better compression (compression is quality per filesize) but take more time!
A lower value is a higher quality and a subjectively sane range is 18-28.
Allow the app to get notified by the system when you take a pic so it can offer quick image compress options
